thread.title: Will iPhone 8 be the most expensive Apple handset ever?
thread.title_full: Will iPhone 8 be the most expensive Apple handset ever?

title: Will iPhone 8 be the most expensive Apple handset ever?
text:
Will iPhone 8 be the most expensive Apple handset ever? Web Report with inputs from IANS /Dubai Filed on February 10, 2017 | Last updated on February 10, 2017 at 12.01 pm Share 
Picture used for illustrative purposes alone (Alamy Image) Apple's next generation iPhone 8 is rumoured to sport a bold new design and would feature an OLED display without a bezel. Buying an iPhone is anyway synonymous with burning a hole in one's pocket. Now with the rumours that Apple has taken it upon itself to launch the most expensive iPhone ever has given its fans a reason to worry! According to the Independent, iPhone8 or the iPhoneX that it is most likely to be called, is predicted to be the most expensive Apple handset that has ever gone on sale. The smartphone is expected to cost more than Dh3,673 ($1,000) as revealed by a new report released by Fast Company. Apple's next generation iPhone 8 is rumoured to sport a bold new design and would feature an OLED display without a bezel. Alongside its usual 4.7-inch and 5.5-inch smartphone offerings, the company will also unveil a third model that will be priced at a higher side than iPhone 7. It will sport a 5.1-inch or 5.2-inch OLED display with invisible home button, all-glass housing, wireless charging, according to earlier reports "Despite the fact that Apple's flagship iPhone lineup continues to be the best-selling smartphone series in the world, fans are anxious for something new-and in 2017, they will get the completely overhauled iPhone design they have been waiting for," news website inquisitr.com reported. Share
